Interface StarRecord

    • Method Detail

      • core

        Record core()
        Returns:
        the core record

      • hasExtension

        boolean hasExtension(org.gbif.dwc.terms.Term rowType)

      • extensions

        Map<org.gbif.dwc.terms.Term,List<Record>> extensions()
        Retrieves all extension records related to the core record across all extensions as a map.

      • extension

        List<Record> extension(org.gbif.dwc.terms.Term rowType)
        Retrieves all extension records of a specific extension. If the requested extension is not mapped null will be returned.
        Parameters:
        rowType - the Term representing the rowType
        Returns:
        possibly empty list of extension record or null if extension is not mapped at all

      • rowTypes

        Set<org.gbif.dwc.terms.Term> rowTypes()
        Returns:
        set of extension rowTypes associated with this star record

      • size

        int size()
        Returns:
        the number of associated extension records across all rowTypes
